HMNZS Manawanui sinks this morning after running aground on Samoan reef last night https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hmnzs-manawanui-on-fire-and-tilting-badly-after-it-ran-aground-off-the-coast-of-samoa-last-night/ 44PLWNBV6RBVJHLVHARNGMOUKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hmnzs-manawanui-on-fire-and-tilting-badly-after-it-ran-aground-off-the-coast-of-samoa-last-night/ 44PLWNBV6RBVJHLVHARNGMOUKU/ Bernard OrsmanAll 75 aboard the ship have been accounted for. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 21:43:19 +0000 Royal New Zealand Navy vessel HMNZS Manawanui ran aground near Samoa on Saturday night. Photo / Profile Boats
Rotorua woman dies two weeks after attack, man charged with second murder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rotorua-woman-dies-two-weeks-after-attack-man-charged-with-second-murder/LFNS2Z6YMFBCZLM6CJ3XHEAOLU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rotorua-woman-dies-two-weeks-after-attack-man-charged-with-second-murder/LFNS2Z6YMFBCZLM6CJ3XHEAOLU/ The woman and her husband were attacked in their Western Heights home on September 23. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 21:12:36 +0000 Police at the Russell Crescent address in Rotorua where a retired couple were critically injured in an assault on September 23. One of the victims, a woman, died last night in hospital. Photo / Ben Fraser
Magnitude-5.7 earthquake hits Wellington https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-earthquake-shakes-central-new-zealand-awake/LYSCGUIF2JEQBPAAHO5VCCEY74/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-earthquake-shakes-central-new-zealand-awake/LYSCGUIF2JEQBPAAHO5VCCEY74/ Isaac DavisonThe magnitude-5.7 earthquake struck minutes after 5am. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 20:37:26 +0000 Over 38,000 people reported they felt the strong earthquake that struck Wellington at 5am this morning on GeoNet.
Dirt bike rider seen with incendiary device outside Gisborne Police Station https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dirt-bike-rider-seen-with-incendiary-device-outside-gisborne-police-station/7JDABLMGW5BAHMPKPC4OVDPQ3U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dirt-bike-rider-seen-with-incendiary-device-outside-gisborne-police-station/7JDABLMGW5BAHMPKPC4OVDPQ3U/ The rider dropped the device and fled upon being spotted by police. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 19:41:29 +0000 The incident took place outside Gisborne Police Station around 4.50am.

Tauranga teen Thomas Magill swimmer beats NZ records https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-teen-swimmer-beats-nz-records/ZMMRDWMRB5HPHEYTJTGEUH2SSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-teen-swimmer-beats-nz-records/ZMMRDWMRB5HPHEYTJTGEUH2SSU/ Ayla YeomanThomas Magill has been flying in the pool of late. Three people missing after car plunges into river in Marlboroughhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/third-people-missing-after-car-plunges-into-river-in-marlborough/LQWEQLMS2BBXTCQFEHQ46OKEVE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/third-people-missing-after-car-plunges-into-river-in-marlborough/LQWEQLMS2BBXTCQFEHQ46OKEVE/ The car had five occupants, and only two have been accounted for.Sat, 05 Oct 2024 18:45:16 +0000 The intersection of State Highway 1 and Bush Road, Tuamarina, where a car with five occupants plunged into the river overnight. Photo / Google
Earthquakes: Can a warning system save New Zealand from the Big One? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/earthquakes-can-a-warning-system-save-new-zealand-from-the-big-one/3U3LM56BWNHTLBAJD227OV7MDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/earthquakes-can-a-warning-system-save-new-zealand-from-the-big-one/3U3LM56BWNHTLBAJD227OV7MDU/ Jamie MortonNZ doesn't yet have an earthquake early warning system, but scientists are paving the way. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 18:35:07 +0000 Willow Woolrich and her classmates at Napier's Ahuriri School take part in a nationwide 'Shake Out' earthquake drill in 2021. Scientists have been exploring earthquake early warning tech that could give Kiwis crucial seconds to prepare before shaking starts. Photo / Warren Buckland
Royal New Zealand Navy vessel HMNZS Manawanui runs aground near Samoa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/royal-new-zealand-navy-vessel-hmnzs-manawanui-runs-aground-near-samoa/YLJL2634NVDJTD6YOQPJDBOMFU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/royal-new-zealand-navy-vessel-hmnzs-manawanui-runs-aground-near-samoa/YLJL2634NVDJTD6YOQPJDBOMFU/ Cherie HowieThe incident took place near Samoa, the New Zealand Defence Force said. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 17:25:21 +0000 The Royal New Zealand Navy ship HMNZS Manawanui is used for salvage and hydrography tasks around New Zealand and across the Southwest Pacific, according to the New Zealand Defence Force's website. Photo / NZDF
